author: Osborne,Bruce
subject: Exploits of Lupin III Update
body:
Well, atlast! Parts 1 and 2 of Exploits of Lupin III have been revised and
posted to the site. A VERY VERY Rough Draft of Part 3 is now up as well.
Part 4 is currently being written and planned out.

http://www.thesoyokaze.net/fanfic/LupinIII

Bruce Osborne
